Ingredients.name: Avocado
Ingredients.problems: Takes up lots of water

Ingredients.name: Apple
Ingredients.problems: None

Ingredients.name: Butter
Ingredients.problems: Butter is a dairy product. Since it comes from cow it contributes greatly to greenhouse gas emissions.

Ingredients.name: Chicken
Ingredients.problems: Being a meat product, chicken contributes to greenhouse gases

Ingredients.name: Rice
Ingredients.problems: The carbon footprint of rice is roughly equivalent to that of international aviation

Ingredients.name: Cauliflower
Ingredients.problems: Cauliflower needs a constant source of water to grow, though the soil only needs to be moist

Ingredients.name: Eggs
Ingredients.problems: Eggs are a meat byproduct, so they contribute equally to greenhouse gas emissions as chicken

Ingredients.name: Tofu
Ingredients.problems: None if grown properly

Ingredients.name: Milk
Ingredients.problems: Milk production contributes to greenhouse gas emissions

Ingredients.name: Cheese
Ingredients.problems: Cheese production contributes to greenhouse gas emissions

Ingredients.name: Potato
Ingredients.problems: Potatoes themselves have a very low carbon footprint, but post-production does increase it somewhat

Ingredients.name: Carrot
Ingredients.problems: Carrots have a relatively low carbon footprint

Ingredients.name: Pasta
Ingredients.problems: Egg pasta's carbon footprint is about a third higher than vegetable-based pastas

Ingredients.name: Flour
Ingredients.problems: Wheat flour is slightly higher in its carbon footprint than maize flour

Ingredients.name: Chocolate
Ingredients.problems: Chocolate has a unique problem that it may be grown and cultivated using slave labor. The consumer will need to do some research to determine where their chocolate comes from.

Ingredients.name: Ham
Ingredients.problems: Pork products have a similar carbon footprint as dairy products

Ingredients.name: Beans
Ingredients.problems: Lentils and most other beans have some of the lowest carbon footprints

Ingredients.name: Bread
Ingredients.problems: Bread production has a slightly higher carbon footprint than regular wheat production

Ingredients.name: Beef
Ingredients.problems: Beef production has one of the highest carbon footprints of any meat product

Ingredients.name: Lettuce
Ingredients.problems: Lettuce has a relatively low carbon footprint

Ingredients.name: Tomato
Ingredients.problems: Tomatoes have a relatively low carbon footprint
